content.text:
# 2024 ICC Awards

| award1_type  = Cricketer of the Year
| award1_winner= '''Men's:  Jasprit BumrahWomen's:'''  Amelia Kerr
| award2_type  = Men's Test Cricketer of the Year
| award2_winner=  Jasprit Bumrah
| award3_type  = ODI Cricketer of the Year
| award3_winner= '''Men's:  Azmatullah Omarzai Women's:  Smriti Mandhana
| award4_type  = T20I Cricketer of the Year
| award4_winner= Men's:  Arshdeep Singh  Women's:  Amelia Kerr
| award5_type  = Emerging Cricketer of the Year
| award5_winner= Men's:  Kamindu Mendis Women's:  Annerie Dercksen
| previous     = 2023
| main         = ICC Awards
| next         = 2025
}}
The 2024 ICC Awards''' were the 20th edition of ICC Awards. The nominations took into account players' performance between 1 January 2024 and 31 December 2024.
Winners and nominees
The shortlists of the nominations for individual award categories were announced from 28 to 30 December 2024.
